tool_description: Show and Calculate worktime/SLA with holidays and non-working time periods
name: Worktime
title: Worktime

api_list.name: Calendar list
api_list.description: Get a list of available calendars
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://worktime1.p.rapidapi.com/calendar/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "worktime1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Calendar work days
api_list.description: Get a count of working and nonworking days in a period

Calendar datetime
Calndar work times
api_list.description: Get an amount of working time in a period

required_parameters.name: unit
required_parameters.description: unit of time to return (Available values : second, minute, hour)

api_list.name: SLA
api_list.description: Show working, non-working time and SLA

required_parameters.name: startperiod
required_parameters.description: start of period to calculate SLA

required_parameters.name: endperiod
required_parameters.description: end of period to calculate SLA

required_parameters.name: unit
required_parameters.description: unit of time to return (Available values : second, minute, hour)

required_parameters.name: nonserveperiods
required_parameters.description: array of non serve periods to calculate SLA

required_parameters.name: unit
